chapters.title: Chapter 49: Court of the Sun
chapters.info: Hehyal, p. 727—Aielman from Aviendha's fifth step through the columns of Rhuidean on her second trip. He has killed more Seanchan than any of his society. He has been granted permission to become clan chief. Oncala is likely to lay a bridal wreath at his feet. He is nicknamed DawnRunner",Dawn Runner See also Dawn Runner; Oncala.
